article:
Dear students,
My name is Mary. I am an _ girl. I live _ a small village in Kenya. It is in Africa. There are many trees ,flowers and _ here. I have a dog and a cat at home. And we can see some giraffes running in the field. I like toys, but I don't have _ .
My school isn't far from my home. So I walk to school every day. We don't have a classroom in my school. We have our _ under a big tree. I like math and music. I think they are very _ . After classes we often _ sports or play games. Many boys often practice playing soccer. There is a river near our village. We often go _ in the river. What's your favorite _ ?We don't have computers. Do you have computers? After school I have to help my mother look after my sisters and brothers.
What do you usually do? Do you want to _ friends with me? Can you write _ me soon?
Love
Mary
